UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Mining the UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot database for antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Li C, Sutherland D, Salehi A, Richter A, Lin D, Aninta SI, Ebrahimikondori H, Yanai A, Coombe L, Warren RL, Kotkoff M, Hoang LMN, Helbing CC, Birol I

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=32µg/ml)
